      • getRuns

        public List<String> getRuns()
        Description copied from interface: RunService
        Returns the list of runs that this service is managing.

        If there are no runs this method returns an empty list.

        Specified by:
        getRuns in interface RunService

        public String createRun(RunProfile runProfile)
                 throws InvalidWorkflowException,

        Description copied from interface: RunService
